article.title: BAE Systems Supports Phased Array Radar Systems
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services, Rockville, Md., has been awarded an estimated $48,631,973 modification (P00374) to contract FA2517-06-C-8001 to exercise option-year seven. The modification will provide for the management, operations, maintainance and logistical support for the solid-state phased array radar systems. The 21st Contracting Squadron, Peterson Air Force Base, Colo., is the contracting activity.
